Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Cardiovascular Disorder/Vascular Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Vascular Disorder/Vasculitis/Necrotizing Vasculitis
Record.Description: A rare condition that involves inflammation and necrosis of the walls of the blood vessels; may occur in rheumatoid arthritis.
